title: Oleksandra Dreval: Motion Graphics Design and animation
text:
The Sinister Secretof Shady Groove
  
  
    Prologue animatic2024
    
    Full creative service: from storyboard to animation.
    
    
      This prologue animatic was created as an introduction to an AAA dark fantasy game, setting the tone for its epic narrative and immersive world. Here, I delivered the full creative and production pipeline: developing the storyboard, illustrating every frame, and animating the final sequence to match the game's mood and pacing. The result is a visually rich, emotionally driven piece that captures the essence of the story before gameplay begins.
    
    
    Illustrations and video: Oleksandra Dreval
    Claire: Naomi Steele
    Music: Music for Messier
    Writer: Wes C.
    
  



             



  
    
    Storyboard

title: Oleksandra Dreval: Motion Graphics Design and animation
text:
Forensicinvestigation
  
  
    Title sequence2024
    
    Full creative service: from storyboard to animation.
    
    
      This title sequence was created as an introduction to a documentary series. For this project, I delivered the full creative and production pipeline: creating the storyboard, producing 3D assets, rendering the final sequence, and doing the video production.
